name: Swordmancer
description:
This prototype was made for the GameJam+ of 2022.

We went with the easy to learn hard to master, with very basic controls, where the player just has to dodge and move around the map, and parry the incoming attacks from the enemies.

Controls:

PausePMoveWASDDeflectRMB

Developed by:

 Gonçalo Verde - Programmer, generalist

 Miguel Martinho - Programmer, generalist
